content.detailedDescription:
Approximately 40 years ago when i was 3 or 4 years old, i had a strange episode of being missing for about 4 hours. the evening prior, my mother tells me that she was sitting on the porch and saw a ufo. 

so, in the morning, my brother and sister go to school and my father goes to work. it was just my mother and me home. my mother set me up at the kitchen table with a bowl of cereal. the kitchen was in the back of the house. she went out the back door to the garage where the washing machine was located. this was right outside the kitchen door. she was only out there long enough to switch the laundry around and came back inside. 

when she entered the kitchen, i was not there. my cereal and her ashtray were overturned. she had heard nothing. the front door and all windows were locked. she would have noticed if someone took me out the back door. i was nowhere in the house. 

the neighbors searched our house, and their houses. my dad came home and searched everywhere, including cabinets i could not fit into. this was a 900 square foot house and it was not like me to hide. the police were called and they also searched the house and neighborhood.

hours later, with mobs of people surrounding the outside of my house, they saw me through the door window and i was inside the house looking out. there was no way that i had been in there! the police asked me where i was. i told them that i was with my uncle. my uncle had been at work all day with many witnesses.

my mother has always felt that this event may be related to ufos.
content.summary: My mother witnessed a ufos, the next day i had missing time, as a child

content.detailedDescription:
While working as security at the airport on the above date and time i looked up in the sky and observed approx. 6 sphere like objects hovereing in the sky to the west, i obseved these "craft" for approx. 30 minutes before i had to answer a question from another airport officer, when i looked back(approx. 10 seconds later) the spheres had left.

i asked around with the taxi drivers in the area to see if they had seen anything in the sky but no one saw anything.

i did not discuss this with anyone since as far as i know i was the only witness, i personly belive the airport was "under obsevation" by these "craft"
content.summary: Observed approxamatly 6 "spheres" hover at about 1500 feet in the western sky, like they may be observeing the airport.

content.detailedDescription:
in june of 1977, myself and 4 friends 
were parked on a rural road outside of victorville california, when we witnessed a saucer-shaped craft approach from the t northwest from over the mountains.  it hovered above power lines and appeared to draw electricity from the power lines.After approximately 9 seconds, the craft returned over the mountains and disappeared. the craft was a dull silver with rotating blue lights around the edge. it made no sound, but the power lines hummed when the craft was hovering. i did not feel threatened, but awestruck.
content.summary: Ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were sitting on our deck talking, and i like tracking airplanes in the vast central oregon sky, so while looking for planes[a local forest fire was requiring forest service planes at the time] i spotted a spot in the sky. i told my daughter that" that one must be high because it don't seem to be moving". it was a partly cloudy day and we observed it between large clouds for about 30 minutes. it remained completely stationary. my wife was due home in a half an hour and we hoped it would stay to get a 3rd witness.My daughter decided to take a pic with her samsung phone and when we looked at the pic it showed clearly a rectangle of six lights, two rows of three. slowly the clouds covered it and we hoped it would be there when they passed, but another clear spot showed and it was gone. this sighting excited us and we spent the rest of the evening scanning the skies.
content.summary: Rectangle of 6 lights seen against blue sky

content.detailedDescription: Riding to a job on the county road, while talking to my boss , i observers a metallic sphere riding parallel to our vehicle, while observing it, i ask my boss wat did he think it was, he looked at it an replied, i don't know, then i said , an they say it isn't a such thing of ufo's, i kept sayn it, then i pointed an said wat the blank is it, it took off so fast where i didn't see it any more, then my boss said its not gone, its in front of us, i lolooked out the front window of the truck an there it was , way up high n the sky, jus settn there, then it moved down, then right, then shot of to the left at a high speed an disappeared,we made it to our destination, an grabbed our tools and went n the house we were to work on, now we've made it n the house, but it was like something was tryn to erase my memory, like dthis jus didn't happen, so when that thought hit my brain, i said it's like i'm n a dream, i asked him do he remembered wat jus happened, he looked at me puzzled, an ask me wat just happen, we r standing n the middle of this empty room, light from the son got it extremely bright inside of it, an i was talking toy boss, he cutsyes short an cuts the lights on in the house, then walked outside, now i'm standing n theiddle of this bedroom with the sun beaming inside brighter than anything i've ever seen, an the light bulb n the room is brighter than the sun, i got scared, walked outside real fast lookn for my boss, remind u it was extra bright inside the house, but when i made it outside, it was dusk, like gettn night, my boss was standing on the side of the house washing his paint brush off like he been painting, i asked wat r u doing its dark out here, he said ur right letts get out of here, on our way home i asked him wat jus went on, he said nonchalantly, i don't know, i asked did he remembered see n the object, an he said yes, then 2 or 3onths later, he died of cancer
content.summary: Seen a metallic sphere, ride parallel to our work truck, i pointed , it went straight up, then disappeared , lost time after the event, bout 3 hours, something was tryn to make me forget like it was a dream , kept asking boss do he remembered wat had just

content.detailedDescription: I was about 6-7 years old.Was in a truck with dad mom and 3 sisters.We were going to virginia from tennessee traveling at night.As we drove there was all kinds of shooting stars.We stopped in a small town to rest.There was a man in black suit at drivers door talking to dad..Next thing i remember is being in a room on the craft looking out a huge window looking down at the top of the mountains as we flew over them.I was in this room alone, i knew my mom dad and sisters were back in another room on the craft.Next thing i remembered we were all back in the truck,with 2 men in black suits one at each open door.One of those men told us..U can not remember what u just saw.In my mind i thought u can not make me not remember..After this my dad became very afraid of thunder storms.He was so scared he would sit at night with a loaded gun and watch out the window of our house.
content.summary: I was about 6-7 years old.Inside truck with family. shooting stars..Men in black..Taken aboard ship...

content.detailedDescription:
In early april, 1994, my son and i were watching television, the news had just started, so it was about 5 p.M. and all of a sudden a blinding light came down over my home.  my son and i jumped up and i grabbed him and held him close.  there was absolutely no sound.  i felt like my brain was racing and my chest was hurting like there was pressure all around us.  i couldn't seem to move or think.  my son was shaking uncontrollably.  when it finally left i sat on the floor and just let my breathing slow down.  my son wouldn't say a word and just kept shaking his head.  that's when i looked at my watch and saw that it was an hour later.  i also realized that my dog was quiet and my cats were hiding.  

the next day i tried to talk to my neighbors about it but everyone told me that i needed to be quiet about it.  they wouldn't say anything to me.   two days after it happened, a man came and said that he needed to inspect my house for the landlord.  i told him that i hadn't been informed by the landlord so he couldn't come onto the property.  he left and i figured that was the end of it.  no such luck.  the same guy followed my son and myself into town the next day and then followed us home.  when i got into the house i knew that someone had been there.  my dog was locked up in the back yard and he was whining.  our horse was running around her pen so she was agitated.

i was so mad that i tried to call the sheriff's office but the phone service was dead.  i was scared and i locked the doors and loaded a gun.  i kept my son home from school and didn't go anywhere for a week.  my phone started working two days later, but by then i no longer wanted to talk about it to anyone.  my son has refused to ever talk about it.  

when i saw your "hanger one" show tonight i decided to finally tell someone.
content.summary: Something came down over my home but there was no sound, just blinding light.  when it left  an hour had past.

content.detailedDescription:
(time and date provided are estimated to best of my recollection.)

i was home on leave from the u.S navy. my wake/sleep hours were off having recently been stationed aboard the uss wisconsin during desert shield/desert storm operations.

i was outside my parents house, listening to music on my car radio.

to the west of the house, about 100 yards away is our towns lumber yard. i noticed, because i look at the stars often, two equally bright white lights, which i assumed were stars, just above the roof of one of the buildings of the lumber yard. i didn't think much of them, other than noticing that they were both an equal height above the roof of this building. 

looking back in that direction a few minutes later, it seemed that these two lights had moved further apart. at first i figured i was imagining it. the more i looked back however, the more the distance between the two lights seemed to grow. because of this, i starting watching continuously. 

within a few more minutes, it was clear that these two lights did in fact appear to be moving further apart, but not up. i got a little nervous when the lights seemed to be getting closer to where i was standing in the street next to my car. 

in a couple more minutes, the lights were almost directly over-head and there was no sound at all. i would say it seemed to be moving across the sky above me at about 10 miles an hour, tops. 
i got nervous about what i was seeing, and climbed inside my car and shut of the radio. the car i was driving at the time was a 68 mustang, in which the previous owner had installed a sunroof. i watched thru this sunroof as the craft continued to pass over-head, still not making a sound. if i had been a little more brave, and had had a flash-light, i am convinced that i would have been able to shine a beam of light onto the object. 

i could not see any color or really even the shape of the craft aside from a few lights. 

as stated earlier, there were two lights on the front of this object. (i say front meaning the end of the object that approached my first.) in the middle of this object, was a v shape consisting of 5-7 red lights which rotated in a clockwise direction, pivoting on a center red light.

i sat, silently inside my car and watched as it slowly moved across the sky directly above myself and the car,without making a sound, through my neighborhood.

before i got into my car, i could see that there was only 1 white light at the tail end of the object, however, upon discussing this encounter later with a friend, it was brought to my attention, that although i remember rushing into my parents house once the craft was gone to awaken my mother and tell her about what i just witnessed, i didn't, and still don't, actually remember seeing the back end of the craft after i had gotten into the car.  meaning i don't actually remember seeing it moving away, i just remember thinking. "okay, it's gone. it's safe to get out of the car and hurry inside the house.

if i were to estimate the size of the object, i would say it was about the length of a football field and, and the front, at least as wide.
content.summary: Noticed lights ow on horizen that appeared to be getting further apart. craft slowly approached and continued from west to east, directly overhead.

content.detailedDescription: Me my girlfriend at the time,tisha valencia,and 5 friends were hanging out in my friends backyard in riverside california.We all noticed a red light coming towards us from a distance.It took about 3-4 minutes,then we saw it approaching over head,just maybe 10-20 feet above the tree line.We all thought it was a police helicopter,because they always fly around the area.When we all noticed it wasn't a helicopter approaching,or plane,balloon,chinese lantern,fire work,rocket,it was a totally silent,and about as big as a vw bus.There was no vehicle that was eminating the light,which was very bright red,like a traffic light,but a dim dull red.When we all said "look at that",it stopped and hovered above us for about 30 seconds. we stood watching,trying to find an explanation for what it was we were looking at,when it shot so fast up, diagonally,we thought it vanished.But i noticed,and showed my friends,a diagonal huge trail of reddish orange light in a line shape,shooting up in an angle,then shooting in the opposite angle and direction,really high up in the sky,until it was so far up in space,we couldn't see it any more.The craft shot up so fast,my mind couldn't understand what it was.I was baffled.We all were baffled.We went through every possible explanation for what it could be,and we all came to the conclusion,that me and my girlfriend at the time,and five friends,witnessed a ufo.I never reported or told anyone about it,for fear of ridicule.This was roughly 1993,1994,end of summer.Thank you.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Flew very slow towards us,a red orb of dim light.Red almost like a traffic light red light.As it approached me and my friends,it made no sound.We all thought it was a police helicopter,so we paid it no mind,until it was right over us.Then it shot away.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on backyard steps star watching at party drinking beer number two.  observed 3 evenly spaced in a line objects which appeared to be satellites traversing south to north. two "satellites" appeared at 80 degrees or less traveling south.  they were evenly spaced and linear. when the five objects met, only two remained and travelled north from view in approximately three seconds. there was lower haze at the horizon and objects only were visible directly overhead to maybe 20 degrees of zenith.  totally dismissed them as satellites but, was alarmed enough to ask if anyone saw the same since i had pointed out the initial three satellites to anyone around me.  my daughter was the only one to acknowledge the lights but, did not elaborate til nearly a year later.  basically, just confirmed that there were lights traveling south to north in a line. don't know and didn't prompt her for more detail.  i do understand focusing on distant objects and covered one eye to defeat parallax. three objects meet two then only two move in the south to north direction.

did a search for lights over long island on that date (can't remember exactly) with no results.  still think it's an unlikely crossing of satellites in an elliptical orbit and i saw them appear as a more cohesive unit.  i think i got lucky to see them at their closest to earth then their orbit removed some from view and only the two were visible traveling north.
content.summary: 3 lights from south to north met by two traveling n to s. then only 2 traveling n.

content.detailedDescription:
While vacationing in aruba i observed a ufo. my friend and i was sitting at the rear of my hotel when a bright light moves horizontally across the sky over the ocean. it stops briefly, darts up vertically and stops. it then flew off at a 45 degree angle at such a high rate of speed that i only saw a brief light tail/trail before disappearing in less than one second.
when i first saw it i knew it wasn't a plane, because it moved to fast, and it was too close to the ground.
i was shocked at this sighting. it confirmed my skepticism about my religious beliefs.It changed my life forever. i now knew that anything was possible. i never doubted my ability again. i quit my job as a banker, became a successful entrepreneur. my friend and i were so traumatized that we never talked about it. we soon parted company. over the next 10 years i didn't tell anyone out of fear. since that time i have met others who have seen ufo's and actual beings outside the craft. my current wife saw a ufo as a child, and didn't talk about it until i shared my sighting with her.
content.summary: Bright light over the ocean. travels horizontally stops, then vertically stops, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I'm a cross country trucker. one evening after midnight on a cool sept night i was driving west on interstate 10 out of van horn texas.As i topped a hill, i saw a bright light off in the distance towards what i thought maybe el paso tx. ahead was a rest area so i pulled into it and parked. as i watched the light it came closer and closer but not fast. it was gradual and steady. it was hard to tell how far it was but at first i thought it was a star but as it came closer it was about the size of a golf ball or a full moon. as i watched it , it seemed to stop. then after a few seconds it just shot south so fast it made me scared and feel like i didn't even really see anything. i climbed back in my truck and got on the cb radio and asked if anyone saw that light. after a moment of silence i heard a voice say " i did". we went to a channel other than 19 and both told the same story to each other. i felt somewhat relieved knowing i wasn't the only one. since then i've only told my wife. i still remember it like it happened today. i'll never forget it.
content.summary: Very bright light in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was around 8 years old. my mother was taking me to get allergy shots. we were coming from copiague ny heading toward west babylon. we took oak street which i think turns into west hoffman then rail road ave. that road follows the long island railroad. we were coming to a stop light that was red. we were about the 6th or 7th car waiting. to my right was a big flower nursery. when we were waiting i seen it first. the ufo looked like a teardrop shape, was chrome looking and hovering back and forth for around 10 mins or more. i told my mother look its a ufo! she said oh my gosh! the crazy thing was, was that nobody honked their horn or drove away. we are in ny, come one now we honk horns for any little thing and no one honked there horn or drove away. everyone was in aww looking at it. it was maybe around 500 feet away and right above the tree line. pretty much right above the rail road track. then after awhile it zig zagged extremely fast . way faster then any of our jets could fly. i also have many years of military experience and know we don't have anything like that is our military. its hard to remember but i thought it might have changed shapes a little to but i'm not 100% sure. it was almost 30 years ago. me and my mother both remember it. me and my brother also seen other ufo's at our old house but it was out in space. it looked like stars were chasing each our doing sharp angles. we both still remember that. i don't know if this has anything to do with it but my brother said he had on several occasions has woke up floating in the air in our room and he was paralyzed and tried to scream out to me but he couldn't. we always thought he was dreaming or it was some demonic or ghost thing.
content.summary: Teardrop, hovering back and forth for about 10 mins. then zig zaged and flew off at an amazing speed. was 100's of witnesses

content.detailedDescription:
It was late and i was standing outside in the driveway with my son, chris. we were both leaning up against my truck, looking at the skyline to the east. i made a comment that it was a strange night, he said i know i saw some strange thing earlier, neither of us commented, but just started looking up into the skyline. earlier i had seen airplanes to the north (lax flight path about 15 miles away). we were looking up and saw two sets of crafts flying across out of the clouds from the southeast. it was hard to make the objects out they were translucent (not see thru)just very light almost matching the cloud color. the objects were moving slowly in formation, to the left were 7 round objects with the leading object (in a "v" formation) pointing the tip to the northeast, they would be about the size of a watch battery at arms length. beside the v were 4 more round objects, same in color and size, flying in a straight line. when the objects were passing directly over head, the 4 on the right in a straight line made a "s" pattern and then resumed into a straight line. they continued to fly past the front of our home and back into the clouds still traveling north west (towards santa monica and coast). this was my first up close sighting. i took the "s" pattern as a communication, i said to my adult son, they are saying hello, wave back and we both did. personally, i have been trained by a paranormal investigation team for 4 years, i know how to internally dissect for information and debunking. my skeptic side of my brain had questioned, "it's a flock of birds", my instinct was to place values of what i observed.
1. flock of birds: nighttime, no place for light reflection, height above where birds normally fly, objects too large, flight pattern was not irregular.
2. observed no airplanes or helicopters in area to compare with. this is unusual since we live to the southeast of the lax flight path. planes usually fly to the direct northwest out of lax or in a straight line on the north side, or they follow the coast keeping to the south of our house. this one chose to fly directly over our house.
3. the round flat objects had no lights that were colored, blinking, search lights or patterns of any kind. they stayed one color very light almost blending in with the cloud color. if you didn't stare or were directly looking for them you would not have noticed them. this rules out planes and helicopters. 
4. goodyear blimp, resides in carson on the north side of the 405 fwy, i suppose many a drunk person at the home depot center would have sworn it was a ufo. the blimp was not out that night, it is large, football shaped, flies very low and has advertisement and multi-colored blinking lights. i have observed the goodyear blimp for 39 years. it wasn't the blimp.
5. there was no sound, no engines.
in conclusion, i ruled out much of what i could to determine this was not man made for commercial or law enforcement use, as i see multitudes of aircraft in the area for such purposes. at first i thought maybe the government would have use for such aircraft, but i leaned towards it still did not seem a military invention. i also felt the wavy s pattern and the direct path over our house, was in direct communication for both of us. which would not at all surprise me. i grew up as a experiencer and taught my son from 8 years old what ufo's were and that we keep it between ourselves. i believe it was extraterrestrial and it was meant to be seen by both of us. this was a positive experience. i was in touch with someone by email regarding this but didn't know if i had sent out a report to mufon, i checked the website and couldn't find a case file for my report previously if it was submitted.
content.summary: 7 circular in a v formation to the left of 4 circular in a striaght formation/the 4 made a s formation to a line formation

content.detailedDescription: I went out to my hunting shack early in morning. as it started getting light out i seen something far off in the sky but i could see it clearly. it was probably over a mile away. it looked father away then it probably actually was. it was either glowing or reflecting of the sun coming up because it was on the western horizon it would move very fast in many different directions at times then it would do slow zig zag patterns back and forth. sometimes it would be still and sometimes it appeared to be wiggling. the quick movements in opposite directions coming to sudden stops were not something a man made object could do. i watched it for an hour or so then it slowly went up into the sky until i could not see it anymore. a few days later i was hunting again and i was looking g for it and happened to spot it doing odd movements again then after a minute or seconds after i spotted it it when up into the sky again slowly i never saw it again but i knew i seen something not normal to everyday life and still do not known what to think about it. i just know i seen something not of this world or something i was not supposed to see.
content.summary: Was moving all over in ways man made flying objects can not move, watched it for an hour one day then i seen it again for a couple minutes a few days later in the same area.

content.detailedDescription:
It was not long after midnight dec. 26, 1979. i was traveling north in my vehicle on padua ave in upland california, it was a clear night... i was 16 yrs old at the time and i had left my girlfriends house and was heading home to my parents house in upland ca. there was a vehicle behind me and 2 other vehicles in front of me.
i have traveled that route many times and after that event seeing jetliners and for scale purposes this ufo had to be what seemed 4 or 5 times the size of a jetliner. i noticed a not so much a cigar shape but  this pure white rectangular object moving seeming slowly across my windshield from east to west. by the time it reached the other side of my windshield it was over mt. baldy mountains or somewhere close to that location. it then stopped and then went from a horizontal to a vertical position and then in a instant this ufo descended straight down in a flash that lit the whole sky and mountains like it was noon straight up. there was no sound or smoke just nothing. like it never happened. i didn't notice that the other vehicles had seen the same event until we all stopped at the intersection of baseline and padua. we all got out of our cars and we discussed for a bit but we did not exchange names or no's. i really kick myself in the but for not getting names or numbers. but i guarentee you they are as obsessed as i have been. i'm sure they will never forget what we saw. i would like to be hypnotized to go back to that event. as soon as i got home i immediatly called cable airport and after no help there i tried ontario airport but got no help they suggested i call the nearest air force base of which i did... they took a statement and said they would call me if they had any questions.  since it was christmas vacation, i worked at friedman's microwave ovens during the week.The next day while taking out the trash at friedman's i noticed all these planes taking off from cable airport and helicopters up in that area. i checked the news, the newspaper everything i could possibly check at that time. there are not to many days that go by where i don't think of that event. i can see it in my mind like it happened yesterday. i'm hoping someone has reported this same event, it was life changing. so incredible!
content.summary: Observed huge cigar shaped ufo moving east to west then just over mt. baldy mtn the ufo stopped then went from horizontil to verticle then descended or ascended in a flash that lit the sky like it was noon. when it flashed it was a shape of a light bulb

content.summary: 7 circular in a v formation to the left of 4 circular in a striaght formation/the 4 made a s formation to a line formation

content.detailedDescription:
At that time i was in the israeli army deployed next to the syrian border.
it was winter time and i was assigned to a patrol on the road along the security fence.
we were heading north at speed of 15 mph as suddenly i saw a spot of orange light moving in the clouds.
i was facing west holding a machine gun, observing this spot moving in exactly the same speed as our vehicle.
it felt like it had been following us for more than 10 minutes so i asked the commander to slow down because i see something strange in the sky.
as we arrived to a full stop, the light stopped moving as well, emerged from the clouds and revealed itself a a flying disc.
it grew larger and hovered above a field, spinning around itself while swinging from side to side. its dome was covered with blinking lights colored in orange light.
it hovered around 20 minutes as all of the sudden it flew up into the clouds in a straight line and vanished.
a few moments later, it was reported to be seen 30 miles north.
this event occurred 20 years ago but it has been bothering me until now. 

thanks
content.summary: Orange flying disc

content.detailedDescription:
Around 11 o.Clock in the evening, my wife and i decided to go out on the front porch and look for the persiod meteor shower. it was a clear starry night. i'm 54 years old, sane and sober. i was staring up at the sky, not seeing any meteors and just relaxing. there's no roof on my porch, it's like a deck. suddenly over my right shoulder, and over my house, i see two very dark objects moving silently over my street, then over the houses across the street and then disappearing into the nw. when i first saw them i said "what the h--- is that?" my wife, who has bad night vision, couldn't see what i was pointing at. the objects were very dark, almost silouettes. they blocked out the stars as they passed, that's why i knew i wasn't seeing things. i couldn't figure out how high up they were or how big they were. one instant i thought they were kites or something but i knew they weren't as i watched them move across the sky. they were triangle shape when the were directly overhead but the they 'flattend out' as they moved off into the distance. i tried really hard to get my wife to see them but they were so hard to see she never looked in the right place. as they moved off to the nw, maybe twenty seconds or so had passed and i told my wife "you can still see them!" but to no avail. they disappeared.
as soon as i saw them i had a creepy feeling, like these things were not meant to be seen. i can't explain it, but that's the thought that ran through my head. i didn't think about 'aliens' or 'extraterrestrials' but i knew i had never seen anything like it, and for some reason, i believe i never will again. they were completely silent and had no lights whatsoever, but they did have some king of design on them. like i mentioned, there were two of them but they moved in such unison that when i first saw them my mind was trying to process them as on object, but after a second or two i saw that they were not connected. i drew a picture of what i saw and will include it. i'm an illustrator and have extensive experience in photo-retouching, if you wonder about the image. i can reproduce what i saw very well and the image is as close as i can remember. i sat on my porch and took a picture, and then drew the crafts in on my computer.
content.summary: On my front porch, two objects side by side, came over my house and proceeded nw, disappearing high over the horizon

content.detailedDescription:
I got off work and was heading home. i worked in frankfort kentucky, live in nicholasville kentucky. i always took the back roads home, thru versailles kentucky. 

i was doing about 55mph on winding roads in versailles, no street lights. in my rear view mirror, i saw two balls of light coming up behind me. the balls were spinning around each other, not spinning individually. the orbs were below the tree line, about 5 feet above the roof height of my car. the orbs caught up with me, flew over top of me and kept going. the orbs were following the road, same as myself. it's like they were mapping the road. 

the orbs made no noise, created no wind and didn't acknowledge my existence. they were traveling at least 2xs my speed, i saw them come from behind me, fly right over top of my car and go follow the road around the curb. once i got up to the bend in the road, i saw nothing. 

these orbs were about 2xs size of a basketball, much too small to contain life. they were clearly mapping the road because they were following the road, every turn. 

i'm reporting this now because i was watching h2 and they were talking about people now have a place to report their sightings, so i figured might as well.

this was the 2nd time i saw a ufo. the 1st time was 10 years earlier, when i was around 12, camping in a neighbors backyard.
content.summary: Two basketball sized glowing balls revolving around each other

content.detailedDescription: Two bright lights shinning on a triangular obgect suddenly two spinning radar type orbs appeared.A bright light made a florescent triangle and a firery red ball flew away fadter than a jet. it seam as though a spaceship was being repaired and then it was gone.
content.summary: Bright light shinning on a triangle two radar screens spinning. light made a florescent triangle and flew away faster than a jet in a red fireball

content.detailedDescription: I have been monitoring the skies in my area for over a year now,both day and night. in april of 2014 i witnessed a triangle shaped ufo, hovering approximately 500 to 1000 feet off the ground, it was silver and very shiny; it had no windows and no visible seams. the ufo was approximately 300 feet wide, after several minutes it slowly turned to the north and dissapeared. from that day forward i have been taking pictures and videos of the sky both during the day and night; i am amazed at how much activity there is here, i have posted many images and several videos on facebook, google+ and youtube. the first video i posted is my most prized video, it is one taken at dusk, there are a few small dark rain clouds around above my home and there was one very large very black cloud. in my video you can see a very large black ufo flying into the black cloud, because it is still somewhat light out there is still a blue hue behind this big black cloud. the ufo flies in on the bottom right of the cloud then through the length of the cloud and out the left side of the cloud, it flies out of view for a minute then comes back flying back into the cloud, there was a second smaller ufo behind the first large ufo. as the two ufos fly through the length of this cloud i noticed movement above the two ufos i zoomed the video in and saw there were 4 more ufos slowly moving around in the upper left corner of this huge black cloud, also as the two ufos were flying back through the cloud you can see a huge white orb flying in front of the two ufos. i have a second video, a night video. in the second video you can see a huge ufo flying with a cluster of dark storm clouds, this ufo is using the clouds as cover but at a point it is completely exposed and very visible, i taped the ufo event for several minutes then switched my smartphone to take still photos. i have several hundred pictures and several videos of a lot of ufo activity in my area. i would love to share my evidence and experience's with the mufon team, my husband (a retired marine) age 71 and myself age 43 are very fortunate and excited to speak with you.
content.summary: Round, surface area seems several colors and huge

content.detailedDescription: It had to be in 1972 we had just moved to georgia my mama and daddy were asleep my granny was up here from fla. we could not have been but 13 to 15 years old were outside and just saw lights they came down and went up everytime my sister came out they went back up when she went back inside they came back low to us that is all i know and remember............
content.summary: All i know is me my best friend saw it when they saw my sister they left that was in 1972  and i have never asked what we saw....

content.detailedDescription:
I saw a ufo flying in the sky above santa fe, nm i was on the back porch what caught my eye was something shining a bright light into the house. at the time i was doing homework, when i saw it i ruled out helicopter, my brother told me it was a satellite even though it was close to one of the buildings near me. 
it looked like it was searching for something it would disappear and reappear in an unusual pattern it looked like it was rotating in a spiral pattern. i couldn’t hear anything from it. i saw the red light and a beam of light come out from it. it did go over my house i know what a helicopter sounds like and this thing didn’t make any sound. it appeared for three days i think it was in april of this year 2015. i didn’t have any feelings other than a feeling of being shocked. i lost sight of it due to it just vanishing in the sky.
content.summary: Santa fe ufo search light

content.detailedDescription:
I was 15 years old in 1975 and was with 2 friends in my living room. i lived in a 4 room apartment on 3rd floor and my mother was not home at time. i felt like a dark cloud above me. my friends were sitting on the couch facing east and i was leaning against a table looking south, when i noticed this object to my right in my kitchen.
   my friends could not see into the kitchen at that time where they were sitting.
        it was the size of a basketball about 6 feet off the floor. it was metallic black, shiny, and had a silver ring around it. like saturn.
  i remember in a matter of 3 seconds, looking to see what was holding it up (a string?) or could i see thru it like an apparition. but no. nothing holding it up and it was very solid.
  the next second i freaked out crying and screaming in shock and collapsed on the sofa with my friends. strangely neither one of them got up to see.
  when i next had the nerve to look it was gone.
    i have called into coast to coast before and spoke with george noory years ago, but he said he never heard of anything like that.
 after watching the show "hangar 1" on h2 history channel tonight i see i was not the only one who saw an orb in my home.
thank you.
       even after all these years i will never forget it.
content.summary: Orb floating in my kitchen

content.detailedDescription:
i was in a boat on a lake near our home with my wife brother-in-law and sister-in-law. i had seen a couple of choppers flying a few minutes before siting the ufo but they left and at the time i did not think to much about it. i just happened to look up into the sky almost right above us and seen it barely moving and it came to a stop almost at once. i reconized what it was from telivision but this one looked a little diferent from the ones on tv.  
   it had a white round top about ten feet tall and 30 to 40 foot long. it also had rather large square windows that looked to go all the way around.
the bottom was a mid grey color with round edges about 75 to 80 feet long.
   i told everyone what i was seeing and for some reason only my brother-in-law looked up to see it and calmly said yes it is and never looked again. i tried to get my wife and sister-in-law to look several times and they never did wich to this day my wife does not understand why she didnt look.It was a lot closer than any i have seen on tv and a lot larger.
   i watched it for about 4 to 5 minutes and remembered i had glasses to get a lot better look so i tried to reach to where they were but had to turn my head for only a second or two and looked up and it was gone. there were no clouds at all in the sky ind it just disapeared. somehow looking at it felt normal and the only thing that bothered me was my family would not turn to look.
  a stranger part is a few days later i saw it again the same angle only somewhat higer at my home. i dont remember how long i stood there watching it but all at once it just slowly kind of just faded till it was gone. i dont want to sound like a nut but ever since then where i was standing wile watching it has a ring af grass that is taller than the center and outside of the ring. whenever i mow the lawn for a few days it is there every time seems to grow longer and darker. again i was very calm the whole time and dont get why.
content.summary: Seen wile fishing on lake then at home a few days later.

content.detailedDescription: Hello yes it was about 3:10 pm in the after noon. my ex girlfriend and i we were in our one bed room apartment so we went. by the sliding glass door to smoke a cigarette. we sat on chairs we had on our balcony and that's when my ex girlfriend saw it first she sad look. i looked and there was this metalic object just hovering it was as big as a basketball so we looked at it it was just there. i had my glasses on i was like wow. it was just there for like ten minutes. at first we walked away and we went back inside. i went back out it was there and i went out agian a minute later. it was gone it was not making any noise it was silent. to be honest my ex girlfriend and i talked about it. we were just amazed about what we saw. we were like wow.
content.summary: I went out side to smoke a cigarette and then i saw it

content.detailedDescription:
1977 age 7 around 830-9 pm i was coming from my friends house , i had just rounded the corner of the apt building when out of nowhere this perfect beautiful light , like a beam surrounded me. the colors were of gold, copper, silver, and seemed to glitter. i was able to move my head but that was all. i tried to touch the light but my arms and legs were being held in place by some force. i looked all around me to the extend my head would turn and just saw this brilliant light. upon looking up i just saw a night light which didn't bother my eyes looking into it.  this lasted probably 3-5 min. i felt at ease though as if it was just checking me out . 

after the light had left , i was able to move instantly. i patted myself all over to just make sure i was ok, then i ran into the field no more than 100 plus feet from me and saw nothing .
content.summary: Perfect cylinder beam came upon me and immobilized me

content.detailedDescription:
I was working on my bike. i looked up and saw what looked like a box kite. i pointed it out to my friend. we looked at it for a min or so. he when in to the house to get a pair of binoculars to look at it. i was looking at it just sitting above the tree line. was he was coming out of the house. i look from the object to him coming out of the house (about 20ft away)
i looked up and it had moved at a high rate of speed towards the mountain.
no sound no movement but towards the mountains. by the time he ran 20 ft
to me. the object had gone about 5 miles to the edge of the mountain and just went around the edge like it was trying to hide from us. he got to where i was standing and it was gone around the edge.
content.summary: Saw what looked like a box kite. no wind no sound no lights. then after 2mins started to move east towards the mountains then went around the edge of the mountain.

content.detailedDescription:
It was new years night, a little after midnight and my wife and i were in our front yard watching the fireworks when my eye fell on a steady light coming towards us. in my opinion the object had a very high speed, because to me it seemed to be at a high altitude.
however, my wife was of the opinion that it was a chinese lantern due to the new year celebrations and fireworks, but chinese lanterns do not emit bright steady light, and/or follow a steady or fixed path at that speed. more so because there was no wind.
before i got my phone out of my pocket and had it in filming mode the object disappeared, like someone flicked a light switch.

however, a couple minutes later i saw an exact same light following the same path, and this time as i had my phone still in my hand and was able to film it until also this one disappeared the same way and about the same spot.

initially i thought it was an over passing satellite which i have seen a few times before, but then i realized it was too bright and most likely not high enough to be a satellite.

both object(s) appeared individually. the second one a few minutes after the first one disappeared. both were flying from the east to the south-west, and it looked as if the second one was following the exact same path as the first one.
even though there were firecrackers going off and cars were passing by as we live on a main road, i did not notice any sound from the objects.

it is important to note that we live far from an airport and at no time there are overflying planes here. not even the the high altitude commercial planes leaving those white trails behind them. you never see those here. once in a while a low overflying coast guard helicopter, but they are very obvious.
also visible overflying satellites are very rare here and are not as bright as the object.

when i realized this was something out of the ordinary, i got excited and got goosebumps at the same time. also a surreal feeling.
however, i could not believe that my wife was convinced it was fireworks or a chinese lantern. even if it was some sort of firework, it definitely was not a chinese lantern.


maybe it might also be interesting to mention that a few months prior to the above observation, my wife was in the front yard around 9 - 9:30 pm to when she knocked on the window to come and see something. when i reached her i was just in time to see a small round orange object which flew away and disappeared in the distance. 
however, according my wife from her point of view it was as large as a (soccer) foot ball, moving very erratically, then hovered for a few seconds over a house in the distance and when i reached it was flying away at very high speed and disappeared.
content.summary: This was not a plane, helicopter, blimp, fireworks, chinese lantern or passing satellite. so what was it?
